# n1, n2, eL, index, fL for each boundary edge
# n1, n2 = two nodes that define the edge
# eL = element next to the boundary edge
# index = boundary group index: farfield(1), main(2), slat(3), flap(4)
# fL = local edge number in eL
#      note: local edge f is opposite local node f
